(-3 x + y - 3 z) + 3 \cdot (x - 2 y - 2 z) = - 30 + 3 \cdot (- 30) \Leftrightarrow
- 5 y - 9 z = - 120 \; : \ \mbox{Gleichung}\  (2') \, .

(- 5 x - 5 y + z) + 5 \cdot (x - 2 y - 2 z) = - 30 + 5 \cdot (- 30) \Leftrightarrow
-15 y - 9 z = - 180 \; : \ \mbox{Gleichung}\  (3') \, .

\begin{aligned}
2 x - y + 5 z & = & 1 \,, \\ 11 x + 8 z & = & 2 \,, \\ - 4 x + y - 3 z & = & - 1\end{aligned}
- 4 x + (2 x + 5 z - 1) - 3 z = - 1 \Leftrightarrow - 2 x + 2 z = 0 \Leftrightarrow z = x \, .
(2 x - y + 5 z) + (- 4 x + y - 3 z) = 1 + (- 1) \Leftrightarrow - 2 x + 2 z = 0 \, .
(8 x - 8 z) + (11 x + 8 z) = 0 + 2 \Leftrightarrow 19 x = 2 \Leftrightarrow x = \tfrac{2}{19} \, .

\begin{aligned}
I_1 - I_2 - I_3 & = & 0\quad:\quad\mbox{Gleichung}\  (1) \,, \\ R_1 I_1 + R_2 I_2 & = & U\quad:\quad\mbox{Gleichung}\  (2)\,,  \\ R_2 I_2 - R_3 I_3 & = & 0\quad:\quad\mbox{Gleichung}\  (3) \, .\end{aligned}
R_1 (I_2 + I_3) + R_2 I_2 = U \Leftrightarrow (R_1 + R_2) I_2 + R_1 I_3 = U \; : \ \mbox{Gleichung}\  (2') \, .
I_3 = \dfrac{R_2}{R_3} \cdot \dfrac{R_3}{R_1 R_2 + R_1 R_3 + R_2 R_3} U = \dfrac{R_2}{R_1 R_2 + R_1 R_3 + R_2 R_3} U

\begin{aligned}
x + 2 z & = & 5 \,, \\ 3 x + y - 2 z & = & - 1  \,,\\ - x - 2 y + 4 z & = & 7 \, .\end{aligned}
